properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 8 at 1:18PM CST until February 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Mississippi River...

Mississippi River at Tiptonville affecting New Madrid...Pemiscot
and Lake Counties
Mississippi River at Memphis affecting Crittenden...DeSoto and
Shelby Counties
Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark affecting Lee and Tunica
Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* from Monday February 10 until Thursday February 13.
* At 12 PM Saturday the stage was 31.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above 34.0 feet Monday February
10.
* At 34.0 feet...Fields are flooding east of Point Pleasant,
Missouri.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
